text: Hasan Azizul Huq (2 February 1939 â€” 15 November 2021) was a Bangladeshi short- story writer and novelist. He was awarded Ekushey Padak in 1999. His best known work was Agunpakhi. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bangladeshi writers Category:People from Khulna Division
